languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, почему вы не можете выражать свою эксцентричность как другие Вольные Торговцы? Зарезервировать палубу под гонки гроксов, играть в живой регицид членами экипажа, высечь на астероиде свое лицо, в конце концов!"

"Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, почему вы не можете выражать свою эксцентричность как другие Вольные Торговцы? Зарезервировать палубу под гонки гроксов, играть в живой регицид членами экипажа, высечь на астероиде свое лицо, в конце концов!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. You could at the very least have your face carved into an asteroid!"

"Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. You could at the very least have your face carved into an asteroid!"

"Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. You could at the very least have your face carved into an asteroid!"

"Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. You could at the very least have your face carved into an asteroid!"

"Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

"Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¿por qué no puede expresar su extravagancia como los demás Comerciantes Independientes? Podría reservar una cubierta para carreras de grox. Podría usar a miembros de la tripulación como piezas humanas en partidas de regicidio. ¡Podría al menos hacer que cincelaran su cara en un asteroide!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ¿por qué no puede expresar su extravagancia como los demás Comerciantes Independientes? Podría reservar una cubierta para carreras de grox. Podría usar a miembros de la tripulación como piezas humanas en partidas de regicidio. ¡Podría al menos hacer que cincelaran su cara en un asteroide!».

languages.text: “舰长大人，您为什么就不能像其他行商浪人那样胡作非为呢？您可以把一整片甲板用来饲养格洛克斯兽，可以让你的船员来当弑君棋的棋子。如果您乐意的话，您甚至可以把您的脸刻在一整颗小行星上！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您为什么就不能像其他行商浪人那样胡作非为呢？您可以把一整片甲板用来饲养格洛克斯兽，可以让你的船员来当弑君棋的棋子。如果您乐意的话，您甚至可以把您的脸刻在一整颗小行星上！”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、変わったところを表現するのに他のローグトレーダーのようにできないんですか？蜥蜴牛のためにデッキを取っておくことができました。レジサイドのゲームで人間の要素としてクルーメンバーを使用することができました。困ったときには、顔を小惑星の中に彫刻することができました！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、変わったところを表現するのに他のローグトレーダーのようにできないんですか？蜥蜴牛のためにデッキを取っておくことができました。レジサイドのゲームで人間の要素としてクルーメンバーを使用することができました。困ったときには、顔を小惑星の中に彫刻することができました！」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, pourquoi votre excentricité se traduit-elle systématiquement de manière aussi fantasque ? Prenez plutôt exemple sur vos condisciples... Vous pourriez réserver un pont entier aux courses de grox. Ou vous servir des membres de votre équipage comme de pions humains lors de parties de régicide. Voire faire graver votre portrait à la surface d'un astéroïde, à la rigueur ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, pourquoi votre excentricité se traduit-elle systématiquement de manière aussi fantasque ? Prenez plutôt exemple sur vos condisciples... Vous pourriez réserver un pont entier aux courses de grox. Ou vous servir des membres de votre équipage comme de pions humains lors de parties de régicide. Voire faire graver votre portrait à la surface d'un astéroïde, à la rigueur ! »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, eksantrik tarafınızı ifade etme biçiminiz neden diğer Hür Tacirler ile aynı olamıyor? Koca bir güverteyi groks yarışlarına ayırabilirsiniz. Mürettebatınızı kral katili oyunlarında piyon olarak kullanabilirsiniz. Çok isterseniz yüzünüzü bir gök taşına oydurabilirsiniz!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, eksantrik tarafınızı ifade etme biçiminiz neden diğer Hür Tacirler ile aynı olamıyor? Koca bir güverteyi groks yarışlarına ayırabilirsiniz. Mürettebatınızı kral katili oyunlarında piyon olarak kullanabilirsiniz. Çok isterseniz yüzünüzü bir gök taşına oydurabilirsiniz!"

languages.text: "Lord Captain, warum könnt Ihr Eure exzentrische Seite nicht ausdrücken wie jeder andere Freihändler? Ihr könntet ein Deck für Grockrassen einrichten. Ihr könntet die Mitglieder Eurer Crew als menschliche Figuren in Königsmord-Spielen benutzen. Wenn die Not drückt, könntet Ihr Euer Gesicht in einen Asteroiden meißeln lassen!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, why can't you be like other Rogue Traders in how you express your eccentric side? You could reserve a deck for grox races. You could use your crew members as human pieces in games of regicide. At a pinch, you could have your face carved into an asteroid!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, warum könnt Ihr Eure exzentrische Seite nicht ausdrücken wie jeder andere Freihändler? Ihr könntet ein Deck für Grockrassen einrichten. Ihr könntet die Mitglieder Eurer Crew als menschliche Figuren in Königsmord-Spielen benutzen. Wenn die Not drückt, könntet Ihr Euer Gesicht in einen Asteroiden meißeln lassen!"
